text: James Joseph "Whitey" Bulger, Jr. (September 3, 1929 - October 30, 2018) was an American former mob boss that worked out of South Boston, Massachusetts. He was on the ten top most wanted fugitives in the United States from 1999 until 2011. His story was on America's Most Wanted on FOX. He was captured by police on 22 June 2011.Whitey Bulger Is Arrested in CaliforniaMobster Whitey Bulger arrested in California On October 30, 2018, Bulger was transferred to the United States Penitentiary, Hazelton in West Virginia. Later that day, he was found dead in the prison, aged 89. Bulger was beaten to death in his prison cell by other inmates. ==Related pages== * William Bulger (his brother) ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths by beating Category:Murdered criminals Category:American murder victims Category:People murdered in the United States Category:People who died in prison custody in the United States Category:American prisoners sentenced to life imprisonment Category:American gangsters Category:American murderers Category:People from Boston
title: Whitey Bulger
